Main Page

Design Overview:

This poster introduces No Longer God: Asura,
an open-world game rooted in Indian mythology with a striking anime-inspired style.
The central character, depicted in profile, stands against a dramatic,
crimson background that hints at a world in turmoil.

Visual Elements:

Color Scheme:
Dominated by deep reds and blacks, the poster conveys intensity and conflict,
with the red tones symbolizing the fiery nature of the Asura.
Character Design:
The protagonist’s side profile, with spiky dark hair and a confident gaze, adds a layer of mystery,
urging viewers to discover more about his journey.
Background:
A large red celestial body casts an ominous glow, suggesting a world on the brink of chaos.
Typography:
The fractured title "No Longer God" symbolizes the fall from divinity,
with "Asura" subtly placed below, emphasizing the mythological theme.

Purpose:
The poster is designed to capture attention and
provide a glimpse into the intense, dramatic world of No Longer God: Asura,
showcasing the game’s artistic direction and narrative depth
